description: A Event for storing the and recalling at a later point of time

properties.description: Describes the data found in the event.
properties.name: content

properties.description: The name of the sender of the event.
properties.name: sender

properties.description: The entities which are related to the client.
properties.name: entities

properties.description: Name of the client from which event was created.
properties.name: client

properties.description: Name of the channel through which event was created.
properties.name: channel

properties.description: Type of the channel through which event was created.
properties.name: channelType

properties.description: The date at which the event was created
properties.name: date
